name: Return-to-Worm
description:
Play as Jerry the worm on his journey to the surface. Discover intricate caves, winding burrows and dens full of Jerry's badger friends (make sure you get close to give them a big hug).

Take charge of Jerry's direction and help him MAKE FRIENDS with all the rats, badgers and humans. Will Jerry make it to the surface? Will he learn the true meaning of friendship?

Content warning: Gore, distressing sounds, kawaii badgers
